name: Epic Fight - New Clash of Strategy War
name_original: Epic Fight - New Clash of Strategy War
description:
Evil has swept across your land,and the dark forces wants to conquer your kingdom in this RPG battle game!
Your goal is to summon your troops,destroy enemies and take back the land!
Attack is the best form of defense!
Choose your super hero,lead your shooter and soldiers,make shrewd decisions to ensure victory in each battle.
Strike out,Fighting!



View the whole battlefield by clicking the left and right of game.
